short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tweaks the Gmail web interface’s delete button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces Gmail’s delete button’s icon with a less subtle version. (If you have chosen ‘Text’ in the ‘Button labels’ section of Gmail’s settings, it will have no effect.)
